entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DEBUG_EXCEPTION_CATCH_HANDLER_FOUND events missing for exceptions caught by func-eval #102178
  • [API Proposal]: Stream.CopyTo{Async} with count #102177
  • GB1030 dotnet info #102174
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `OverloadResolutionPriorityAttribute` #102173
    9.0.0
  • Android AOT startup crash #102166
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(genRegMask(initReg) & intRegState.rsCalleeRegArgMaskLiveIn) == 0' in win-x86 #102161
    9.0.0
  • JIT: RBO's utilization of liberal VNs is illegal #102158
    9.0.0
  • WebSocket failures on wasm test runs #102157
    9.0.0
  • [mono] [aot] Mono mini fullAOT CI job is failing due to Failed to load AOT module X86_Sse2_r/ro.dll in aot-only mode #102150
    Future
  • Bizarre decimal-to-double behavior difference on same machine, same code #102149
    9.0.0
  • [browser] More flexible boot config schema #102148
    Future

Closed

  • Config generator emits lambdas for error path that force allocation on success path #90971
    9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Baseservices runtime tests failed in Mono fullAOT llvm job #92883
    Future
  • Test failure for TensorPrimitives MinNumber and MaxNumber on Arm64 #102156
  • Test failure in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.SingleGenericTensorPrimitives.SpanDestinationFunctions_SpecialValues #101731
    9.0.0
  • arm32 fails in CI with "/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.34' not found" #102030
  • [wasm-wasi]: release build fails, debug build succeeds #100488
  • NativeAOT metadata encodings #101333
  • Failure to run console .exe after .net8 upgrade if hostfxr.dll is present. #98335
  • Show a prompt to users when opening a .NET exe on Windows asking if they want to install .NET automatically if they don't have .NET installed #101918
  • [API Proposal]: Method for creating a List #102100
  • mono: Implement support for generic unmanaged calli #98819
    9.0.0
  • Hot reload fails to flow generic constraints to the inherited class #100826
    9.0.0
  • JsonSerializer doesn't support valid TimeSpan formats #100538
    Future
  • Consider moving System.IO.Pipelines into the shared framework #28760
    Future
  • System.Text.Json: DefaultJsonTypeInfoResolver throws on `CreateJsonTypeInfo` for interfaces with duplicate properties #101673
  • Using UnsafeAccessorAttribute (.NET 8) on struct throws 'System.BadImageFormatException' occurred in Console.dll: 'Invalid usage of UnsafeAccessorAttribute.' #102151
  • High Memory Consumption When Validating Remote Certificates With Client SslStreams #101552
    9.0.0
  • HTTP stress build is broken #101625
    9.0.0
  • `GetFromJsonAsAsyncEnumerable` not working when using custom httpHanlder with compression #102113

PullRequests

Created

  • SVE: Added `LoadVectorx2`, `LoadVectorx3`, `LoadVectorx4` APIs #102180
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix ulong->double conversion on x64 (without avx512f) #102179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add OverloadResolutionPriorityAttribute #102176
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update ARM64 LLVM AOT runtime builds to use the generic libclang.so file #102175
    area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0-staging] Backport #92375 #102172
    needs-area-label
  • Fix NRE in bulk memmove on x86 #102171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement some more Math APIs #102170
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Remove reserved registers from parameter homing temp reg candidates #102168
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Allow using pinvoke registers in the prolog #102165
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove reflection from FrameworkDescription #102164
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add InheritServiceKeyAttribute to enable resolving the dependencies with the same key #102160
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] [mono][interp] Keep delegate alive during invocation #102159
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm] Suppress export name minification #102155
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Fixed the discrepancy between applicationName between normal app launch and HostFactoryResolver launch #102152
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Add ProbeLoongArch64Quirks() for R2RDump tool. #102146
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift frozen struct lowering in mini-JIT/AOT/interpreter #102143
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • make SocketAddress useable after receive timeout #102142
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Adjust repro file message for merged test #102141
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • JIT: SVE cleanup - More SVE format merging #102104
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Change the ReciprocalEstimate and ReciprocalSqrtEstimate APIs to be mustExpand on RyuJIT #102098
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Optimize bundled_resources key creation, hashing, and comparison #101460
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Config generator emits lambdas for error path that force allocation on success path #100257
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Read types from contract descriptor #101994
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono] generic wrapper methods for unsafe accessors #101732
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix comments in ZipFileExtensions.ZipArchiveEntry.Extract.cs #100791
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Ensure that the TensorPrimitives.Min/MaxNumber functions follow the IEEE 754:2019 spec #102162
    area-System.Numerics
  • Unpin arm build image, use Debian 12 helix images #102059
    needs-area-label
  • Refactor handling of two immediates in hwintrinsic #102071
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [release/8.0] Fix data race leading to a deadlock when opening QuicStream #102147
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.x
  • Fix the typo in IOptionsFactory source documentation #100384
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Backport #92296 and #92438 to release/6.0-staging #101822
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 124.0.6367.201, windows: 124.0.6367.201 #102119
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix VirtualCallStubManager stats capturing on EE shutdown #102073
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • TimeSpanConverter: Less restrict in-range check to allow more timespan formats that would be accepted by Utf8Parser.TryParse #102091
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Enable building with gcc-14 #101623
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.CreateFalseMask*() #102076
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Add PipeWriter overloads to Json #101461
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Handle GT_CNS_LNG and GT_CNS_DBL in GenTree::Compare #102137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Target NetCoreAppToolCurrent in ILC test projects #102058
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make it possible to eliminate branches guarded by IsEnum #100399
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Change erroneous use of && to & when used to make a bitmask #101338
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix msquic on latest (2.3.5) release #102085
    area-System.Net.Http

Updated

  • [RISC-V] Fix context restoration as #101709 describes #101865
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #102096
    area-System.IO.Compression, 6.0.x
  • Use bison for ilasm parser generator #101415
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • TypeDescriptor-related trimming supportType descriptor #102094
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Synchronized description of destinationDirectoryName parameter #100330
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • ILLink: Add EdgeVisitor and ITracingNode to enable logging dependency graph edges to illink dependency loggers #101949
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NativeAOT] Remove `linux-arm` as a supported RID in .NET8 #102072
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Use SIMD for block inits with GC fields #102132
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Experiment] Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Tensor wave 1 API's. #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimize memory allocations (#98702) #99542
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Reorder stores to make them amenable to stp optimization #102133
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Fixed creating generic type with abstract type when it is has a default constractor constrant #101963
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move unicodedata to minipal #102139
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [WinHttpHandler] Move `_cachedSendPinnedBuffer` ownership to `WinHttpRequestState` #102083
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 8.0.x
  • [wasm] Enable custom mmap in MT builds #102064
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Unify `GT_JMP` handling in the backends #102117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Removed unused sessions from SSL_CTX internal cache #102095
    area-System.Net.Security
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Spanify some ``Utf8String`` and ``Utf8StringBuilder`` use #102101
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • Upgrade GCLogParser to NetCoreAppToolCurrent #101089
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert OAVariant interop to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ILLink: Add PropertyNode for dependency analysis #102026
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [browser] Separate hybrid globalization JS code to es6 module #101543
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use ``BitOperations`` in couple more places #101701
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Add quirks for riscv to R2RDump #101683
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Where possible, use ReadableStream.pipeTo to load files into the heap #101982
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use the cbl-mariner-2.0-cross-amd64 image #102069
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [NativeAOT] `clang -fuse-ld=lld` output is low priority #102000
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix some comment typos #101232
    area-Meta, community-contribution

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot update maui workload. #40850
  • dotnet test does not find any tests if environment variable is set that ends with .dll or .exe #40848
  • Turning off .NET Package Validation check for backwards compatibility across different frameworks feature #40847
  • [dotnet watch publish] command with -fileLogger switch is broken after updating Visual Studio 2022 from 17.5.3 to 17.9.6 #40841
  • Unable to build on new system #40840

Closed

  • Latest "dotnet watch" returns an error on Ubuntu 22.04 #29352
  • After installing VS 17.4, I can't run `dotnet watch` for .NET6 projects #33592
  • dotnet watch on net6.0 project results in FileNotFoundException for SystemRuntime #28942
  • Hot Reload just doesn't work. #29163
  • DOTNET_WATCH_SUPPRESS_EMOJIS=True does not suppress all emoji #30070
  • dotnet watch cli command throw route ambiguity (multiple routes available) #31976
  • `dotnet workload` always installs maui workload as root. This is making it impossible to build a project as a regular user on Manjaro/Arch Linux #40692
  • Globalization invariant mode not working on Linux with .NET 8 Preview 6 native AOT #34091

PullRequests

Created

  • Exception --> logged error in ResolvePackageAssets #40851
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Port changes from VS where we stopped using custom tracing event arguments class based on BinaryFormatter #40849
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Fix Alpine Target RID #40843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • simplify GetOSVersion #40842
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Merged

  • Add bootstrapper validation to clickonce test #40683
    untriaged, Area-ClickOnce
  • Fix well known non-checked in infrastructure binaries #40844
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Show workload update notifications for workloads installed via Visual Studio #40705
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Publish PRs for Source-Build Test Results #40753
    source-build, Area-VMR
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2449819 #40693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add `http` prefix when docker config detect a insecure registry #39840
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Diagnostic is unclear when passing ref readonly to ref readonly parameter using 'ref' #73459
  • Stack overflow in `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Binder.BindBinaryPattern` when getting compiler diagnostics in Roslyn.sln #73457
  • Visual Studio operates on outdated cache after git pull again #73455
  • Rename class property changes all occurrences of property name in all comments in project. #73453
  • Hot reload fails to flow generic constraints to the inherited class #73448
  • CSC : error CS0041: Unexpected error writing debug information -- 'Insufficient memory to continue the execution of the program.' #73447
  • Test plan for "First-class Span Types" #73445
    .NET 9
  • Formatting not working #73443

Closed

  • Raw string literals guide line is shifted when using tabs #64230

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove array allocations for formatting rules. #73458
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • net9.0 reference assemblies #73454
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • For validation only #73449
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add "First-class Span Types" feature status #73446
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add more "ref in async" tests #73444
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async

Merged

  • Optimize suppress operations during formatting. #73456
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Produce less string allocs while formatting documents #73452
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve memory allocs in interval trees #73451
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add dynamic registration for razor and cshtml files #73369
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make placement of raw string guide line independent of the space chars used #73435
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Port tests of "Invert if" refactoring to `VerifyCS/VB` #73440
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Small tweaks to speed up ctrl-click #73442
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do less work computing diff-merge results in the common case. #73430
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce LOH allocs when applying code fixes. #73424
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid LOH allocation in text synchronization #73425
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Partial properties: attributes #73437
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove virtual from 'SourceMethodSymbolWithAttributes.SyntaxNode' #73433
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Net9 Reference Assemblies #73423
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Emit and roundtrip underlying instance field #73407
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Switch Roslyn protocol types to System.Text.Json serialization #73207
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update msbuild version to 17.3.4 #73283
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Ignore drive casing when comparing on windows platforms #73380
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run final fix-all code-cleanup phase out of process. #73357
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Recognize 'allows ref struct' constraint in VB compiler #73429
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Always use DiagnosticHelper.Create for diagnostics with options #73339
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Templates.Mvc.Tests are failing on Helix builds #55695
    9.0.0
  • Consider increasing the default iteration count for PBKDF2 to follow OWASP recommendation #55690
  • ASP.NET Core with Angular throws Exception on startup after publish #55687
  • Unhandled exception rendering component: Could not load file or assembly #55686
  • NavigationException thrown in Static Server Render #55685
    .NET 10 Planning
  • ability to override `CssClass` property in `InputBase<T>` #55684
  • Allow more granular return types in signalR #55683

Closed

  • Inconsistent translation of template strings #46301
    Infrastructure
  • Use FrozenDictionary where appropriate #47569
    9.0.0
  • Investigate Blazor WebAssembly startup performance characteristics #54353
    9.0-preview5
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, plaintext #55681
  • Switch JSON serializer usage over to new source generator APIs #31877
    9.0-preview5
  • [Static Web Assets] Runtime APIs to consume the generated endpoint manifest from the SDK #54875
    9.0-preview5
  • Performance Challenges of Blazor Server Applications in Low Bandwidth Environments Compared to MVC and Traditional Web Applications #55671
  • Security Claims not Identifying Expiration Time. #55333
  • Binding to IFormFileCollection results in empty collection #55174
  • Blazor Bug in LONG data type #55521

PullRequests

Created

  • Reset exception handling behavior in tests #55698
    area-infrastructure
  • Temporarily skip MVC tests on Helix #55696
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.5.24262.2 #55688
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview5
  • Revert "Remove __non_webpack_require__ workaround and split Node dependencies correctly (#48154)" #55229
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 8.0.6
  • [Blazor] Adds compresion support for all assets in an application #55558
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add custom message to NavigationException #54862
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] Add an API to describe the render mode (if any) a component is running in #55577
    area-blazor
  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking
  • Relocate webtransport streams initialisation from HTTP3 connection accept loop to streams type #55425
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Use DisposeAsync in FileStreamResultExecutor #55524
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add separate activities for Hub methods #55439
    area-signalr
  • Make DefaultProblemDetailsFactory public #55666
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add AnyHeader and AnyMethod #55650
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add .NET 9 nightly NuGet feed and remove .NET 7 #55680
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • #54445 ChecksumValidator: Support checksum SHA256 even when the metadata uses Sha256 #54446
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Hybrid + Web solution template missing project refs in .sln when created via VS Code #22381
  • [IOS] Maui .NET 8 The app has been terminated when start debugging #22379
  • [MAUI] The "XamlCTask" task failed unexpectedly #22378
    Backlog
  • MAUI RadioButton with ControlTemplate Stops Working on iOS and MacCatalyst #22377
    Backlog
  • .net Maui: Memory Leak in iOS Controls not getting cleaned up #22376
    Backlog
  • iOS Simulator and phone showing partial keyboard or crashing #22375
  • App net.maui problems with backgruod color application #22374
  • The style on the switch is not working #22373
  • Scrolling a TableView causes java.lang.IllegalArgumentException #22372
  • FlexLayout.Grow="1" text cuts off instead of line break on Windows #22371
  • Add Manual test for [iOS] FlyoutPage Shadow works incorrectly on iOS #22370
    Backlog
  • [Trimming][AOT] Investigate trimming and AOT warnings in `dotnet new maui-blazor` sample app #22368
    .NET 9 Planning
  • ImageButton Padding stops working with .NET 8 #22364
    .NET 8 SR6
  • CarouselView content calls SizeChanged forever with certain parent view/display resolution combinations #22363
    Backlog
  • IndicatorLayout isn't being correctly cleared out when bindable property is set to null #22361
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]The Recipe window on the Edit recipe page cannot adaptive #22360
  • [iOS] Cannot create archive due to the "Unzip" task failing with System.NotSupportedException because the app package content includes the link to local drive #22359
  • Layout incorrect after visibility is toggled of a child view #22358

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix null handling in UpdateIndicatorLayout method (#22361) #22382
    community ✨

Updated

  • MenuItem gets updated when IconImageSource changes - Fix 17210 #18119
    community ✨, area-controls-menubar, stale, t/desktop, Under Consideration
  • [Android] SemanticProperties.HeadingLevel not working in ListView #21830 #22135
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview, t/a11y
  • [iOS] Fixed RadioButton text related properties not working #20366
    community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton
  • [Windows] Improve performance of `ContentPanel.EnsureBorderPath` #22346
    platform/windows 🪟, legacy-area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-boxview
  • [iOS] BoxView auto scaling not working when layout changes #21955
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-boxview
  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • Controls(Android): fix frame background color #14917
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-frame, Under Consideration
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-slider
  • [WinUI] Fix DateTimeFormatter for "ddd" #20045
    area-controls-datetimepicker
  • Picker ItemsSource fixes #19728
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, stale
  • Fix iOS picker placeholder text overrided (#15139) #15198
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker, Under Consideration
  • Fix Android ImageButton background, ripple and padding #22298
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-button
  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [Android] ImageButton Border does not fit to CornerRadius - fix #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border
  • [Android] Action mode menu doesn't disappear when switch on another tab - fix #21231
    community ✨
  • Stop Android from pinning native references to system services #22281
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, Backlog
  • [Windows] Clamp images inside buttons to button width/height #22276
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-button
  • Fix frame ping #22347
    area-layout
  • Reduce the number of calls to invalidate measure #21801
    area-layout, t/perf, .NET 8 SR6
  • Remove implicit reference to Maui Compatibility and template references #22203
    area-templates
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leaks in `*Cell` #22067
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-listview, memory-leak 💦
  • [Trimming] Add ILC compilation test of all assemblies #22328
    area-publishing
  • [Android] Entry & Picker VerticalTextAlignment ignored #21966
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-controls-picker
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    platform/windows 🪟, do-not-merge, area-controls-image
  • [iOS] Apply contentInsets for any entry/editor in a scrollview #21807
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, layout-scrollview
  • [Span] Improve formatting inheritance #21191
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-label
  • [iOS] Readonly Editor - Scrolling fix #20505
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Border has a 1 pixel thickness even when it's thickness property is set to 0 - fix #21197
    area-drawing, area-controls-border
  • Fixes KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when using scrollable Editor #21932
    community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Android] InputTransparent="true" on a Layout breaks child controls - Fix #22345
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • Picker Attribute "SelectedIndex" Not being respected on page load - fix #22353
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Optimize converters for GridLength, ColumnDefinition, and RowDefinition #20048
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Allow PathFigureCollection to string conversion via converter #19889
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • Optimize Thickness and CornerRadius converters #20033
    legacy-area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • Hide FlyoutIcon when FlyoutBehavior set to disabled #20087
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed line break mode for buttons #20133
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Fixed picker title's color #20205
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Inheriting Visual States #20467
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix CarouselView loading previous item #22280
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview
  • Previously selected item cannot be reselected fix #21490
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Flyout IsGestureEnabled fix #21686
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [Android] Border Stroke gradient can only switch to another gradient - fix #22168
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨
  • [iOS] Span's TapGestureRecognizer not working if text is truncated #22213
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ```dotnet ef dbcontext optimize``` generates invalid code when using an inner type converter #33710
  • Owned Entity is not loaded inside multiple levels of sub queries #33709

Closed

  • Consider adding support for ArraySegment<byte> #33568
  • Auto-generated compiled model results in an error after entity type rename #33487
    9.0.0
  • Option to enable `DECLARE @x AS type = value` style logging of parameter values #33566
  • Explain why triggers aren't working after adding the following migration #33691
  • Connecting to SQL Server with EFCore 8 throws an exception, but EFCore 6 does not #33705

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.38.1 to 3.39.1 #33711
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fixes #33635 - Translate ToString on enums with number store types as a CASE/WHEN expression #33706

Merged

  • Refactor compiled models MSBuild integration. #33700

Updated

  • Fixes #20604 - Treat ToString as casting to string in the database #33701
